person.note: The Pilgrim, Pamphilus is the main character of Pilgrim of Castile who travels around and searches for his love, Nisa.
Pamphilus is the name of the Pilgrim, who is the protagonist of the story.
Felix is the name Nisa gives to Finia when she pretends to be a man.
The name which Ali Japha gave to Nisa when she stayed in the habit of a Moor.
Leila Acha is refered to as Acha after being introduced with her full name.
The Christian name Leila Acha receives.
Helen of Troy, a beautiful woman said to be the cause of the Trojan War.
A famous demi-god in Greek mythology, known for great strength.
The Roman mythology version of the Greek mythicaly god Zeus.
The god of the grape harvest, winemaking and wine, of ritual madness, fertility, theatre and religious ecstasy.
The man from the Bible who God used to part the Red Sea and led Israel out of Egypt.
